original_text:
🟦 **Figma Files for IPO Under the Ticker FIG**
Figma is officially preparing to go public and list its shares on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). This move signals the company’s intent to raise capital for growth - giving investors the chance to buy into the business and trade its stock on the open market.

💰 A portion of the IPO proceeds will be directed toward AI innovation, launching new products, and potentially acquiring promising startups.

💡 **What’s an IPO?**
An IPO (Initial Public Offering) is when a company offers its shares to the public for the first time. It’s a major step in scaling a business - allowing it to attract investment - but it also means becoming publicly accountable, with financials and plans open for everyone to see.
translated_caption: Wah, Figma dah nak masuk pasaran saham! Nampak gaya nak kembangkan bisnes lagi ni, siap nak labur dalam AI dan keluarkan produk baru. Kiranya, dorang nak bagi peluang kat kita semua untuk jadi sebahagian daripada syarikat ni dengan beli saham dorang. Bestnya!

original_text:
👗 **Google Launches App for Virtual Clothing Try-On**

[Doppl](https://blog.google/technology/google-labs/doppl/) lets users virtually try on outfits using a digital version of themselves.
Here’s how it works: first, you upload a full-body photo of yourself, then you add screenshots of different outfits — whether it's a look from a store window, a friend's outfit, or a screenshot from social media.

Doppl will generate an image of your virtual self wearing the selected outfit.

The app is available on iOS and Android in the United States.
translated_caption: Wah, Google dah keluarkan app baru! Boleh cuba baju secara virtual tau. Caranya senang je, upload gambar badan penuh, lepas tu masukkan gambar baju yang korang nak try, contohnya dari kedai, baju kawan, atau screenshot dari media sosial. Nanti app tu akan tunjukkan macam mana baju tu nampak bila korang pakai. Sekarang ni baru ada kat US je, untuk iOS dan Android.

🗣️ Mistral just launched [Voxtral](https://mistral.ai/news/voxtral) — an open-source speech recognition model.

⚡ It’s 2x cheaper than competitors, supports 32K token context, and can handle up to 40 minutes of audio.
Available in two sizes: 3B (compact) and 24B (full-scale).

👀 A real challenger to Whisper?
translated_caption: Wah, Mistral baru je keluarkan Voxtral! Model pengecaman suara sumber terbuka. Dengar kata, lagi murah dua kali ganda dari pesaing lain, boleh proses konteks 32K token, dan tahan sampai 40 minit audio. Ada dua saiz pulak tu, 3B (kecik) dan 24B (besar). Macam boleh lawan Whisper ni!

📈 **Figma just made a massive comeback on the stock market.**

After going public on the New York Stock Exchange, Figma’s shares closed at $115.50 — triple its initial IPO price of $33. This pushed the company’s valuation to a staggering $67.7 billion.

To compare, Adobe tried to acquire Figma for $20B nearly three years ago — a deal that ultimately collapsed due to regulatory pressure. Looks like Figma didn’t just survive, it thrived. 💥
translated_caption: Wow, Figma nampaknya betul-betul buat kemunculan semula yang hebat di pasaran saham! Harga saham mereka naik mendadak selepas disenaraikan di Bursa Saham New York, meningkat tiga kali ganda daripada harga IPO awal. Ini melonjakkan nilai syarikat tu ke angka yang sangat besar. Ingat tak dulu Adobe cuba nak beli Figma dengan harga yang jauh lebih rendah? Nampaknya Figma bukan saja bertahan, tapi berkembang maju!
